channel.title: Shop Maker
channel.description:
Well i decided to release my 30 minute Coding of a shop maker, This is the prototype of the script so fare, So its not really flashy, But it works. Script: [code] echo NPC Id? set /p NpcId=Option: If not Exist ShopMakerFolder MD ShopMaker Folder Echo [Add under the '}' after 'WanneShop = 2;' in client.java] >> ".\ShopMaker\Shopmaker Code.txt" Echo else if (NPCID == %NpcID%) { >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt" Echo PutNPCCords = true; { >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt" Echo WanneShop = 30; >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt" goto menu2 :menu2 set /p ShopId=Shop Id: pause goto menu3 :menu3 cls set /p ItemId=Item Id you want in your Shop: pause goto menu4 :menu4 cls set /p Cost=Cost of that item: Echo [Add in shops.cfg] { >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt" Echo %ShopId% 1 1 %ItemId% %Cost%{ >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt" pause goto menu5 :menu5 cls Echo [Add in autospawn.cfg] { >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt" set /p cords=Cords X: pause goto menu6 :menu6 set /p coords=Cords Y: pause goto menu7 :menu7 Echo %NpcId% %cords% %coords% 0 0 0 0 1{ >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt" goto finished :finished echo finished. pause goto menu [/code]
The picture, Of a finished script. [IMG]http://i119.photobucket.com/albums/o150/lockandload_2007/pic-1.jpg[/img]
You can use on your own utilitys, Give to mates, So forth, But remember it was made by me, So no leeching :)
Also, If you don't live this topic tell me, Ill delete it.

item.title: Shop Maker
item.dc:creator: @dog_eats_dog dog eats dog
item.description:
@dog_eats_dog wrote:

Well i decided to release my 30 minute Coding of a shop maker, This is the prototype of the script so fare, So its not really flashy, But it works.
Script:

echo NPC Id?
set /p NpcId=Option:
If not Exist ShopMakerFolder MD ShopMaker Folder
Echo [Add under the '}' after 'WanneShop = 2;' in client.java] >> ".\ShopMaker\Shopmaker Code.txt"
Echo else if (NPCID == %NpcID%) { >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt"
Echo        PutNPCCords = true; { >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt"
Echo        WanneShop = 30; >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt"
goto menu2
:menu2
set /p ShopId=Shop Id:
pause
goto menu3
:menu3
cls
set /p ItemId=Item Id you want in your Shop:
pause
goto menu4
:menu4
cls
set /p Cost=Cost of that item:
Echo [Add in shops.cfg] { >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt"
Echo %ShopId%		1	1	%ItemId%	  %Cost%{ >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt"
pause
goto menu5
:menu5
cls
Echo [Add in autospawn.cfg] { >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt"
set /p cords=Cords X:
pause
goto menu6
:menu6
set /p coords=Cords Y:
pause
goto menu7
:menu7
Echo %NpcId%	%cords%		%coords%	0	0	0	0	1{ >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt"
goto finished
:finished
echo finished.
pause
goto menu

The picture, Of a finished script.

You can use on your own utilitys, Give to mates, So forth, But remember it was made by me, So no leeching

Also, If you don’t live this topic tell me, Ill delete it.

Read full topic
